definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: It was bound for the Russian Republic of Dagestan in the North Caucasus.
sentences.chinese: 该飞机飞往北高加索地区的达吉斯坦俄罗斯共和国。

sentences.english: The slides show taxes paying form of tax system of Republic of Uzbekistan.
sentences.chinese: 幻灯片提供的是乌兹别克斯坦共和国税务系统纳税表。

sentences.english: Both factions field armies from the Roman Republic.
sentences.chinese: 两派都派出了罗马共和国军队。
佛罗伦萨曾是一个共和国。

sentences.english: When you have PDR , abnormal blood vessels grow in the retina.
sentences.chinese: 当你有民主共和国，异常血管生长在视网膜。

sentences.english: The Bolivarian leader's vaunted popularity tumbles.
sentences.chinese: 委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国领导人所吹嘘的声望猛跌。

sentences.english: The territory of the modern Republic of Macedonia became a part of the Province or Banate of Vardar (Vardarska Banovina 1).
sentences.chinese: 马其顿共和国的领土变成Vardar省的一部分。

sentences.english: Montenegro is one of the non-EU states which uses the euro.
sentences.chinese: 黑山共和国是一个非欧盟成员国使用欧元的国家。

sentences.english: Do not forget those who have been wrongfully accused by the Republic and died refusing to close their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记那些被共和国诬蔑而死不瞑目的人们。

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国海水水质标准。

sentences.english: A colleague in Ghana had telex but no fax.
sentences.chinese: 在加纳共和国的同事有电传机，但没有传真机。

sentences.english: Conflicts in its north Caucasus republics have flared again.
sentences.chinese: 北高加索共和国地区的冲突硝烟又起。

sentences.english: Which is the capital of America A. New York B. Beijing …
sentences.chinese: 北京是中华人民共和国的首都。

sentences.english: Jungle Republic Legal Adviser, where are you?
sentences.chinese: 丛林共和国法律顾问，你在哪里？

sentences.english: We are a Corporate Run country with the trappings of a Republic.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一个企业经营性质的共和国。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Ministry of Communications of the PRC is the institution in charge of the nation-wide highway undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 第三条中华人民共和国交通部主管全国公路事业。

geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
